dealers1-msg: One of {{appName}}'s added values is that we gather purchase links from the larger dealers in {{region}}, so you can access to a safe dealers' list in your region.
dealers2-msg: Also, in order to make it easier to you, our app fetches these distributors' prices and availability, to offer you the best possible purchase.
noDealers-msg: We don't have agreements or dealers in {{region}}
discounts1-msg: {{appName}} has also negotiated agreements with certain stores in order to offer you discount codes.
discounts2-msg: These codes will be shown to you when available, when you click each dealer's <Buy> button.
